The circle forms a single loop and face in the sketch. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.4054. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the euler angles and translation vector provided in the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by a depth of 0.1419 to create the 3D model. Part 2 Instructions Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered top and a flat bottom.
